page.title: 07Housing
page.content: The houses in all 12 squares of the survey area we looked at and dated as far back as possible.We found that a few of the houses went back to the 17th century,thst about 20% of them were around 75 to 100 years old but that the rest had been built in the past 20 years.By far the greatest number of them-about 65% were semi-detached with the next higher number being detached with a small number of bungalows and terraced and a few cottages and a few farm houses.All the houses except the 17th cent. ones were brick built_the majority being tiled there were some slate and about 20 thatched in the old part of the village.All the new ones had small gardens except the ones in Main St. had very large ones going down to the fens.
